column1: *Correction: The Virgin Islands FY 2019 payment error rate is 6.76 percent.
1  Pursuant to changes in Section 4019 of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (the Act), the Department set the QC tolerance threshold at $37 for

column2: fiscal year (FY) 2014 and adjusts the threshold each year following Section 3(u)(4) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008, as amended.

column1: For FY 2019, the tolerance threshold is $37.
2 Due to rounding, the payment error rate may not always equal the sum of the overpayment and underpayment error rate.
